member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION
member.summary: The MANAGEDAPPLICATION structure contains information about an application. The function returns an array of MANAGEDAPPLICATION structures.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.pszPackageName
member.summary: The user-friendly name of the application.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.pszPublisher
member.summary: The name of the application's publisher.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.dwVersionHi
member.summary: The major version number of the application.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.dwVersionLo
member.summary: The minor version number of the application.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.dwRevision
member.summary: The version number of the deployment. The version changes each time an application gets patched.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.GpoId
member.summary: The GUID of the GPO from which this application is deployed.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.pszPolicyName
member.summary: The user-friendly name for the GPO from which this application is deployed.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.ProductId
member.summary: If this application is installed by Windows Installer, this member is the ProductId GUID.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.Language
member.summary: The numeric language identifier that indicates the language version of the application. For a list of language numeric identifiers, see the Language Identifier Constants and Strings topic.

summary.para: Indicates the type of package used to install the application. This member can have one of the following values.
The application is installed using the Windows Installer.
The application is installed using a legacy setup application.
The application is installed by an unsupported setup application.

member.name: MANAGEDAPPLICATION.bInstalled
member.summary: This parameter is TRUE if the application is currently installed and is FALSE otherwise.
